public TrafficTicket registerTrafficTicket(@RequestBody

                                                                                                                          org.springframework.dao.DataIntegrityViolationException
        registering a new traffic ticket
        Parameters:
        eventForm - - driverId vehicleId date; street; city; otherVehicleId ( no need to pass for this) otherDriverId ( no need to pass for this) trafficTicketCause - one of: "Accident", "TrafficTicket", "ParkingTicket" amountOfFine
        Returns:
        a new TrafficTicket

        javax.validation.ConstraintViolationException
